sentences.sContent: To compare medical abortion practised at home and in clinics in terms of effectiveness, safety and acceptability.
sentences.sContent_eng: To compare medical abortion practised at home and in clinics in terms of effectiveness, safety and acceptability.
sentences.sCn: 旨在比较在家或在诊所进行药物流产的有效性、安全性和可接受性。

sentences.sContent: It will please Thai consumers, he believes, and might also help broaden the acceptability of the durian, unlocking the door to American and European customers.
sentences.sContent_eng: It will please Thai consumers, he believes, and might also help broaden the acceptability of the durian, unlocking the door to American and European customers.
sentences.sCn: 他相信无臭榴莲将会取悦泰国消费者，同时有助于扩大榴莲的可接受性，打开面向美国和欧美消费者的大门。

sentences.sContent: Failure to abort completely, side-effects and acceptability were the main outcomes of interest.
sentences.sContent_eng: Failure to abort completely, side-effects and acceptability were the main outcomes of interest.
sentences.sCn: 不完全流产、副作用和可接受性是我们关心的主要结果。

phrases.pCn: 社交能力；社会可接受性；社会接受度

words.tran: 可接受的；合意的；可忍受的
